Reviews.Title: “Service and Cleanliness spoil good Infrastructure”
Reviews.Author: Alberto T
Reviews.Content: Hotel is full of qualities and Facilities but service and cleaning conditions spoil the whole experience...

Reviews.Title: “Good as a business hotel but not more”
Reviews.Author: Sepmer
Reviews.Content: The hotel is good if you are travelling on business as it is close to TUYAP and is clean enough, but that is all there is. The service is ok, but not spectacular and certainly less than expected from a 5-star hotel. I would avoid the restaurant as the food was not special (or warm for that matter). There is nothing to do around so avoid this hotel if you want to do something outside the hotel. It is far away from the city (20 km to the airport and 45-50 km to the city centre), so be careful about that. Walls are so thin that you can hear the conversations from neighbouring rooms. Couples beware!! We made the mistake to book a room over the weekend with my wife and checked out a day early and booked another hotel to get over this one.

Reviews.Title: “I got much better than I paid for it !”
Reviews.Author: Zvezdan M
Reviews.Content: I just came back today. I was there for 3 days, attending exhibition in Tuyap exhibition center. Perfect for that occasion. Hotel offers transfer to the Fair center by van. It's 5-10 min. of driving. I got very good price on www.booking.com and what I got is much better than what I paid. Breakfast is good enough. Room is almost perfect. Only remark is too small bathroom. Hotel stuff is professional. Buyukcekmece (the suburban of Istanbul) where actually hotel is situated is great place. Looks like touristic town with a plenty of cafes, restaurants and shops. Hotel is about 100m away from the seaside (Sea of Marmara). You can walk alongside the sea for kilometers. It was very pleasant and there were a lot of people walking. Istanbul city center is away more than 40km and if you go by taxi you would probably pay more than 60 EUR. There is better combination of transportation, if you have enough time - you catch local bus (100m away of hotel) no. 76c, get out on station Avgilar and catch metrobus 34 to station Zeytinburnu, there catch metro no. 1 to Aksaray and after that tramway going directly to Topkapi. You need 1,5-2 hours (it costs 4 EUR). Not good if you want to visit Istanbul everyday.

Reviews.Title: “OK for conferences, lousy location”
Reviews.Author: Ana_na_putu
Reviews.Content: Stayed for three-days conference, dacilities are decent, so are the rooms. Quite good, all in all. However, it is over one and a half hour ride to Taksim (city center) and the public transportaiton cannot be relied on. Taxi would cost you up to 70EUR in one direction, so be aware of this before you haul.

Reviews.Title: “Average Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Subeih
Reviews.Content: This hotel is great if you are on a business trip and attending one of the exhibitions held at Tuyap Expo Center nearby which is 5-10 minutes drive from the hotel. There's a nice sea view and it seems like the hotel is situated in a small town near Istanbul. I didn't get to try to the spa although I was told it was the biggest in Istanbul. However if you are using this hotel as a base to explore Istanbul then forget it, it's far and will take you too much time to get there. This is a strictly business type hotel in my opinion. Hotel offers good breakfast, rooms are good, staff are helpful, all in all a good experience but nothing special.

Reviews.Title: “5 star? it felt more like a 2 star plus hotel !”
Reviews.Author: urmilgohil
Reviews.Content: Good price for the stay, the service was average to poor, the hotel is trying to be a high class 5 star hotel, however its more a 2-3 star hotel, with locals and Middle Eastern guest., very few westerners. do not book your airport transfer with the " airport and tourism and travel agency" the first one after arrivals for car rental, i paid them 70 euros for back and forward transport from Eser hotel, i had booked and paid for the transport from eser to the airport at 5 am - they never showed up and i had paid an extra 35 euros for the taxi,

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel, great service...”
Reviews.Author: rmdplzgm
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed a lot... Great service, well trained smilling staff. You could feel that management is very professional. Spa is great, relaxing, well equiped and good service.

Reviews.Title: “a friendly athmosphere in a big hotel”
Reviews.Author: ElizabethSweden
Reviews.Content: We had some great days with colleagues using the conference facilities at Eser hotel. Very friendly and helpful staff though english language not so good. Wonderful rooms nice soft beds. But smell of cigarette in some rooms The food in the restaurant was very good. Served by nice staff. The Spa was excellent. When one of us needed medical help the hotel provided quick assistance. We can recommend this hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Best 1 around”
Reviews.Author: alpkayar
Reviews.Content: Do not hesitate to book if you are on a business trip to the area. I have been to several fairs in Tuyap Expo Center and stayed at several hotels. They were either expensive or lousy hotels. And don't get the idea that by paying much you get better service. Dedeman is a very well known hotel chain in Turkey (not so much by outsiders), this specific one is new in the chain. The new blood brought quality to the area, will book again in my next visit. Ask for upper levels so you can have a great sea view, also try fine dine roof restaurant. Fantastic view and great food. If you travel there in summer, the public beach is 50 meters walk, but it can get very crowded. Be sure to have a walk in BÃ¼yÃ¼kÃ§ekmece Bay, sunset is exceptional. Several shopping malls, one historic bridge made by "Mimar Sinan", an aquapark with nice rides, some fish restaurants by the bay and some restaurants that serve local food from different areas of Turkey is all to see. I have heard of a complex with jeep driving ranges, water sports, picnic and BBQ facilities by the lake but never been there. Maybe I will try it next time.

HotelInfo.Name: Eser Premium Hotel & Spa
HotelInfo.Address: Fatih Mah. Gazi Mustafa Kemal Cad. | No:11 Buyukcekmece, Istanbul 34500, Turkey
